description: Returns a list of insights associated with the account or OU Id.

parameters.name: StatusFilter
parameters.description: A filter used by ListInsights to specify which insights to return. Ongoing (dict) --- A ListInsightsAnyStatusFilter that specifies ongoing insights that are either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE. Use to filter for either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE insights. Closed (dict) --- A ListInsightsClosedStatusFilter that specifies closed insights that are either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE. A time range used to specify when the behavior of the filtered insights ended. FromTime (datetime) --- The earliest end time in the time range. ToTime (datetime) --- The latest end time in the time range. Any (dict) --- A ListInsightsAnyStatusFilter that specifies insights of any status that are either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE. A time range used to specify when the behavior of the filtered insights started. FromTime (datetime) --- The start time of the time range. ToTime (datetime) --- The end time of the time range.

nested_params.name: Ongoing
nested_params.description: A ListInsightsAnyStatusFilter that specifies ongoing insights that are either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: Use to filter for either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE insights.

nested_params.name: Closed
nested_params.description: A ListInsightsClosedStatusFilter that specifies closed insights that are either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: Use to filter for either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE insights.

nested_params.name: EndTimeRange
nested_params.description: A time range used to specify when the behavior of the filtered insights ended.

nested_params.name: FromTime
nested_params.description: The earliest end time in the time range.

nested_params.name: ToTime
nested_params.description: The latest end time in the time range.

nested_params.name: Any
nested_params.description: A ListInsightsAnyStatusFilter that specifies insights of any status that are either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: Use to filter for either REACTIVE or PROACTIVE insights.

nested_params.name: StartTimeRange
nested_params.description: A time range used to specify when the behavior of the filtered insights started.

nested_params.name: FromTime
nested_params.description: The start time of the time range.

nested_params.name: ToTime
nested_params.description: The end time of the time range.

parameters.name: AccountIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account. (string) ---

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitIds
parameters.description: The ID of the organizational unit. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ProactiveInsights
nested_items.description: An integer that specifies the number of open proactive insights in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the insight summary.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the insight summary.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: An array of severity values used to search for insights. For more information, see Understanding insight severities in the Amazon DevOps Guru User Guide.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: An array of status values used to search for insights.

nested_items.name: InsightTimeRange
nested_items.description: A time ranged that specifies when the observed behavior in an insight started and ended.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the behavior described in an insight started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the behavior described in an insight ended.

nested_items.name: PredictionTimeRange
nested_items.description: The time range during which anomalous behavior in a proactive anomaly or an insight is expected to occur.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time range during which a metric limit is expected to be exceeded. This applies to proactive insights only.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the behavior in a proactive insight is expected to end.

nested_items.name: ResourceCollection
nested_items.description: A collection of Amazon Web Services resources supported by DevOps Guru. The two types of Amazon Web Services resource collections supported are Amazon Web Services CloudFormation stacks and Amazon Web Services resources that contain the same Amazon Web Services tag. DevOps Guru can be configured to analyze the Amazon Web Services resources that are defined in the stacks or that are tagged using the same tag key. You can specify up to 500 Amazon Web Services CloudFormation stacks.

nested_items.name: CloudFormation
nested_items.description: An array of the names of Amazon Web Services CloudFormation stacks. The stacks define Amazon Web Services resources that DevOps Guru analyzes. You can specify up to 500 Amazon Web Services CloudFormation stacks.

nested_items.name: StackNames
nested_items.description: An array of CloudFormation stack names.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services tags that are used by resources in the resource collection.

nested_items.type: for example, CostCenter, Environment, Project, or Secret
nested_items.description: A tag key (for example, CostCenter, Environment, Project, or Secret). Tag keys are case-sensitive.

nested_items.type: for example, 111122223333, Production, or a team name
nested_items.description: An optional field known as a tag value (for example, 111122223333, Production, or a team name). Omitting the tag value is the same as using an empty string. Like tag keys, tag values are case-sensitive.

nested_items.name: ServiceCollection
nested_items.description: A collection of the names of Amazon Web Services services.

nested_items.name: ServiceNames
nested_items.description: An array of strings that each specifies the name of an Amazon Web Services service.
(string) ---

nested_items.description: An integer that specifies the number of open reactive insights in your Amazon Web Services account.

DevOps Guru can be configured to analyze the Amazon Web Services resources that are defined in the stacks or that are tagged using the same tag key. nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
